author: gorgonzola
title: Wall of Gum - A Novel Virtual Place
description: Ported dApps are coming - Cardano needs home-grown, one-of-a-kind dApps to serve our awesome community. We will need fun dApps beyond DEXes!
solution: Wall of Gum is the world's first decentralized gum wall. Gum balls are stuck to wall slots creating NFTs. Plutus contract enables trading.
experience:
- Plutus Pioneer Cohort #2 member
- Prototype created (see video) written in Javascript, Python.
- 7+ years programming experience
